p.span: Gilmer County Schools will be closed until further notice. Non-traditional Instructional Day packets will begin on March 19, 2020. A calendar as to how to complete these activities is available below to provide guidance.

h2.span: Wednesday, April 29-Friday, May 1, students are to complete NTID/Snow Packet Day #13

h3.strong: Food Delivery Plan for Gilmer County Schools:

p.span: Until farther notice, Mondays will be a pick-up drive thru option only at Gilmer Elementary from 7:30 AM to 1:00 PM. We will continue to ask parents, neighbors, care givers, and etc. to use the parent pick up loop and remain in their vehicles. The boxes of mass meals, including 5 breakfasts and 5 lunches will be brought to their vehicle. Again, Monday’s will be our meal Pick up day.
